g.style: transform-origin: bottom right; animation: 1.1s ease-in-out 0s infinite alternate both running vibrateb

path.style: fill: #98d1ec; transform-origin: bottom right; animation: 1s ease-in-out 0s infinite alternate both running vibratea

g.style: transform-origin: bottom right; animation: 0.9s ease-in-out 0.1s infinite alternate both running vibrateb

path.style: fill: #253a65; transform-origin: bottom right; animation: 1.05s ease-in-out 0.1s infinite alternate both running vibratea

g.style: transform-origin: bottom right; animation: 1.02s ease-in-out 0.07s infinite alternate both running vibrateb

path.style: fill: #1f9fcd; mix-blend-mode: hard-light; transform-origin: bottom right; animation: 0.97s ease-in-out 0.03s infinite alternate both running vibratea
